sentence.Network_en: She also stimulated his curiosity and opened his mind to other cultures.
sentence.Network_cn: 她还激发了他的好奇心，使他愿意了解其他文化。

sentence.Network_en: There was much curiosity about what manner of man he was.
sentence.Network_cn: 他究竟是什么样的人，大家都十分好奇。

sentence.Network_en: They are there only to satisfy their ghoulish curiosity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们去那里纯粹是为了满足其病态的好奇心。

珍品,奇人,引起好奇心的事物

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French curiousete, from Latin curiositas, from curiosus (see curious)

entry.def: Curiosity is a desire to know about something.

example.ex: Ryle accepted more out of curiosity than anything else...
example.tran: 赖尔更多的是出于好奇才同意的。

example.ex: ...an enthusiasm and genuine curiosity about the past...
example.tran: 对过去的巨大兴趣与真正的好奇

entry.tran: 罕见而有趣之物;奇物;珍品
entry.def: A curiosity is something that is unusual, interesting, and fairly rare.

example.ex: There is much to see in the way of castles, curiosities, and museums...
example.tran: 可以看到很多城堡、奇珍异品和博物馆。

example.ex: Reed International is a curiosity in the international world of publishing.
example.tran: 里德国际公司是国际出版界的一朵奇葩。

means.word_mean: 1. a state in which you want to learn more about something
2. something unusual -- perhaps worthy of collecting

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =run,表示"跑,发生,快速做……"; 2. =care,表示"关心"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 正确无误的;准确的,精确的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ac再+cur关心+ate……的→再关心,弄精确为止

stems_affixes.value_cn: 好奇的, 求知的, 古怪的, 爱挑剔的

stems_affixes.word_buile: accurate[[adj.正确无误的;准确的,精确的]]→n.准确[性];精确;准确度
cur关心+io→珍贵的被人多加关心的东西
cur关心+iosity多……的状态→关心多→好奇心
con共同+cur跑,发生,快速做……→共同跑→共同发生
in进入+cur跑,发生,快速做……→跑进来→招惹

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发生,出现;存在;想起,想到
stems_affixes.word_buile: oc向+cur跑,发生,快速做……→某个方向跑,发生

stems_affixes.value_cn: [尤指不好的事]一再发生;重现
stems_affixes.word_buile: re再次+cur跑,发生,快速做……→再次跑来

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,ose+ity组成,表示"多……的状态"

stems_affixes.word_buile: anim生命+osity多的状态→生命太多→由爱变恨→仇恨
curi=cure关心+osity多……的状态→关心多→好奇心
grandi=grand宏大+osity多……的状态→n.宏伟,夸张,堂皇
pomp壮丽,盛况,夸耀+osity多……的状态→n.华丽,夸耀
verb词语+osity多……的状态→n.唠叨,冗长

means.word_mean: 好奇心, 爱打听的癖性,求知欲

sentences.en: He gave in to curiosity and opened my letter.
sentences.cn: 他抑制不住好奇心, 拆开了我的信。

means.word_mean: 奇人, 奇物, 珍品,罕见而有趣之物

sentences.en: This old map is quite a curiosity.
sentences.cn: 这张旧地图的确是件珍品。

jushi.english: Harry's curiosity got the better of him and he unlocked the cupboard.
jushi.chinese: 哈里在好奇心的驱使下打开了橱柜的锁。

jushi.english: Your curiosity must be well satisfied if you have no more questions to ask.
jushi.chinese: 如果你不再有问题要问,那你的好奇心一定得到了充分的满足。
我的好奇心被充分激发了起来。
